sections.name: Acrobat
sections.text: Acrobats perform feats of agility, balance, and strength. The acrobat is a 5th-level challenge for contests of acrobatics and the like.

sections.name: Performers
Let's See A Show
sections.text: Prices for a night's entertainment are per head and can be far higher for world-class performers. **Circus** 1 sp; **Dance** 2 cp social, 6 cp stage performance, 1 gp high-society ball; **Stage Play** 6 cp small theater, 1 sp major theater; **Opera** 5 gp general admission, 20 gp box seats; **Music** 5 cp troubadours, 2 sp orchestra; **Street Performance** tips of 1–2 cp.
Performances can serve as entertainment, expressions of beauty, or part of a shared culture.

traits.name: Human
traits.text: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.

traits.name: Humanoid
traits.text: Humanoid creatures reason and act much like humans. They typically stand upright and have two arms and two legs.

interaction_abilities.name: Steady Balance
interaction_abilities.text: When the acrobat rolls a success on an Acrobatics check, they get a critical success instead. They aren't flat-footed when attempting to Balance and can attempt an Acrobatics check instead of a Reflex save to Grab an Edge.

automatic_abilities.name: Cat Fall
automatic_abilities.text: The acrobat treats all falls as 50 feet shorter.

automatic_abilities.name: Nimble Dodge
automatic_abilities.trigger: The acrobat is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see
automatic_abilities.effect: The acrobat gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still calculate damage using Strength.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than its listed type. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon with versatile S can deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you attack.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still calculate damage using Strength.

traits.name: Nonlethal
traits.text: Attacks with this weapon are nonlethal (page 407), and are used to knock creatures unconscious instead of kill them. You can use a nonlethal weapon to make a lethal attack with a –2 circumstance penalty.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Thrown
traits.text: You can throw this weapon as a ranged attack; it is a ranged weapon when thrown. You add your Strength modifier to damage as you would for a melee weapon. When this trait appears on a melee weapon, it also includes the range increment. Ranged weapons with this trait use the range increment in the weapon’s Range entry.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than its listed type. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon with versatile S can deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you attack.

ability.name: Sneak Attack
ability.text: The acrobat deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

universal_monster_ability.name: Sneak Attack
universal_monster_ability.text: When the monster Strikes a creature that has the flat-footed condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon.

ability.name: Swinging Strike
ability.text: The acrobat swings on a rope or trapeze, moving up to double their Speed. At any point during the swing, they can make a melee Strike.
